name: liri-node-app
description: Liri app  =========================== ABOUT ============================ This application allows a user to make a request for information about concerts, songs, movies by way of command lines, IT utilizes Bands In Town, Spotify, and OMDB API's along with a series of node modules to assis with the requests. This application was created by Joshua Balao Directions on how to use it ae below. =======================================
